artworks.title: Sample Artwork
artworks.description: This is a sample artwork for testing the museum guide application.

curator_notes.note: This is a test artwork created for development purposes.
curator_notes.author: System Admin

artworks.title: Abstract Expression
artworks.description: A vibrant abstract piece exploring color relationships and emotional expression through bold brushstrokes.

curator_notes.note: This piece demonstrates contemporary abstract techniques with emphasis on color theory.
curator_notes.author: Dr. Art Curator

artworks.title: Digital Landscape
artworks.description: A stunning digital landscape that blends photography with algorithmic art, representing the intersection of technology and nature.

curator_notes.note: Pioneering work in the digital art space, showcasing new possibilities in medium integration.
curator_notes.author: Digital Arts Curator

curator_notes.note: The algorithmic elements were generated using machine learning techniques trained on natural landscape patterns.
curator_notes.author: Technical Curator
